external_games.name: Who Am I: Hidden Object Adventure Full

name: Who Am I: Hidden Object Adventure Full
storyline:
Total recall.
Enjoy the well-loved characters of the popular game City of Fools! Somebody is terrorizing the entire city with a secret weapon. In search for the people, who stand behind the crime you lost your memory. Run an investigation to restore the truth and bring villains to justice. Solve a cavalcade of challenging puzzles to uncover the truth. You are the only one who can save the world.
This all new hidden object adventure presents you a plethora of unique gaming mechanics, including photo-robot, minesweeper, quiz, memory and match-it games. Every good or evil deed changes your future. There are 12 different endings, which solely depend on your choices. Funny characters and unexpected side quest ignite the spirit of adventure. Download the game “Who am I?” and start the most exciting investigation ever!
summary: "Who am I?" is an immersive hidden object adventure of an epic scale. Take the role of an undercover agent investigating strange sci-fi incidents in the city. A weapon of mass-destruction has been threatening people. Solve puzzles and seek out clues in over than 70 detailed scenes. Find out who you really are to save the world!
